document_data.name: Dornar Steelsar
document_data.mainbody: '''Dornar Steelsar''' was a man of [[Silverymoon]] who married into the [[Amn]]ian [[Parhek]] dynasty in the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Dornar married Princess [[Rasa Parhek]] and they had four children–[[Choris Steelsar|Choris]], [[Rosa Steelsar|Rosa]], [[Rohav Steelsar|Rohav]], and [[Rhothar Steelsar|Rhothar]].
document_data.History: He met and made a family with Rasa while she was hiding in [[Silverymoon]], but they were found by assassins from Amn in the {{YearlinkName|1297}}. Dornar and their son Choris died to allow his wife and children to escape, though Rosa was killed and Rohav was captured and manipulated by the hostile agents.
